article: joerg haider powered his political party to a stunning win in his home province sunday , confounding pundits and strengthening the odds for a national comeback for the controversial rightist known for anti-jewish slurs and a friendship with saddam hussein .
abstract: controversial rightist wins re-election hopes to regain national prominence
